BRIEF-Nvoi Says Co Appoints Philip Crutchfield As Non-Executive Chairman

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 18:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Nvoi Says Co Appoints Philip Crutchfield As Non-Executive Chairman Oct 18 (Reuters) - Nvoi Ltd : * APPOINTS PHILIP CRUTCHFIELD TO NVOI BOARD AS NON-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN * RECEIVES COMMITMENTS FOR A $4.6 MILLION CAPITAL RAISING TO INSTITUTIONAL AND SOPHISTICATED INVESTORS * WILL EXPAND CURRENT FOOTPRINT TO FULL HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT * TO RAISE $4.6 MILLION THROUGH PLACEMENT OF 461 MILLION NEW SHARES AT ISSUE PRICE OF $0.01 PER NEW SHARE * STEVEN PAPADOPOULOS HAS RELINQUISHED ROLE OF CHAIRMAN
